body: Hi Mostapha, The sample file works with the given orientations, however if you add windows on other orientations then the extrusions of the windows seem to duplicate and go in different directions. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DWRjbZBls-K8H-TtcCnetu9wLdJQyE7cJkT9M3ZintNBrjMRVZJzj81cGmJJUBD8iFf*VGAJOCx7NfZMrbFs8Du4kHcYEjBV/WindowExtrusions.JPG)I have played around with the UV coordinates and trying to single out orientation windows, however I am wondering if there is a simpler method of making this work.
